works.title: Software Developer
contents: Working as a frontend developer to develop a workflow ERP system by using Sveltekit and React JS and collaborating with backend developer to integrate backend API into the system

works.title: Software Developer (Part Time)
contents: Collaborate with backend developer and designer to develop frontend of the job matching portal, fruit delivery site and e-commerce platform with Sveltekit, Vue JS and Astro JS frameworks with Graphql
Showcaseable project: <a class='text-[var(--primary-green)] no-underline underline' href='https://gaiabox.co' target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer'>https://gaiabox.co<a>
Build pure frontend projects such as marketing funnel form templates and templates generator with Sveltekit

works.title: Software Developer
contents: Build the entire frontend codebase for job matching portal using Sveltekit and Graphql integration with Houdini
Working in a team to develop frontend of the ride booking system, warehouse management system by using Sveltekit
Liaise with clients to solve any issues and maintain the web applications
Develop admin panels of some web applications with Retool
Has minimal exposure with Express JS for developing ride booking calculation
